column1: ## Any line starting with # is a comment and will be ignored.
## The format of this csv file is as follows
## Note that we need the _sunet_ not the email prefix; i.e.
## foo.bar@stanford.edu might be a valid email address but
## the sunet id is not foo.bar!
## Allowable choices for roles are student or instructor.
## No other values are allowed. Case matters.
## Note also how things are quoted.
## The header line that follows here should be left alone
